comment_body:
This reminds me of a classic movie with John Candy and Dan Akroyd, *The Great Outdoors.* One of the funniest films I've ever seen, and the raccoon scenes with raccoon subtitles are comedy gold.

Well done, Ursula!

Thank you, I am told being compared to John Hughs is a huge compliment ðŸ™ƒ

Although, I can't help adding, this is not really a comedy, and the garbage creatures aren't the racoons...
